Message:
There’s an angel and
a demon inside me.

The angel tells me
to save the world,
while the demon whispers
the sweetest temptations.

You knew what
you truly wanted,
so why are you
hesitating now?

...He’s trying to
save the world.
So, I’ll do the same.

Not for the world,
but for him.

But, I’m sure he’ll look at me
with those gentle eyes and say,

“Your life is more precious
to me than the world.”

If I heard such wonderful
words from him,

it might make me
just want to abandon
the world.

After all, there’s a secret
I’ve been hiding.

The power of God is
hidden away in someone
who shouldn’t exist—

the foolish Witch of Qlipha
who bears the number 0.
